Meningococcal warning for Māori and Pasifika students over summer as cases rise in young adults https://www.nzherald.co.nz/kahu/meningococcal-warning-for-maori-and-pasifika-students-over-summer-as-cases-rise-in-young-adults/Q6MVIYQMUJCEBO6JMYAAJV7VTM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/kahu/meningococcal-warning-for-maori-and-pasifika-students-over-summer-as-cases-rise-in-young-adults/Q6MVIYQMUJCEBO6JMYAAJV7VTM/ Māori and Pasifika most at risk; calls for wider meningococcal vaccination access. Mon, 16 Dec 2024 20:00:00 +0000 Māori and Pacific peoples are the ethnic groups most at risk, accounting for over half of meningococcal disease cases (195 out of 364) reported since 2019.
